name: Justin M Johnson
title: Budtender/ trimmer
coverLetter: I was a receptionist and budtender at Absolute Herbal in DTLA. I have trimming experience. Open schedule. HIV+ cannabis patient and activist. I produced The Hemp Hop Show and a Cannabis IPA. I have proven experience in taking ideas and manifesting them into reality.
experience: Absolute Herbal 2 months recent. Not enough hours. Self employed cannabis industry 3 years. 1 year maintenance mechanic in bong factory for Bio Hazard Inc / Pure Glass. I produce cannabis beer and The Hemp Hop Show.
additionalInfo: Osha 30 is a safety supervisor card.
